Fans Share Ranveer's Old Apology Video After He Received Flak For His Comments On KWK
The Internet can forgive you but it hardly ever forgets. After Hardik Pandya landed into controversy for his regressive remarks on Karan Johar's chat show Koffee With Karan, people dug out an old video of Ranveer Singh.
The Simmba actor received a lot of criticism for his remarks.
In his debut episode on the chat show, Ranveer had described how he was floored by Kareena Kapoor Khan's beauty when she would come to a club for swimming. "I went from child to boy", he said in the clip while describing his feelings to see Kareena swim.
Agencies
That's not all. In the video, Ranveer Singh asks Anushka Sharma if she wants to get her 'A** pinched'.
"You want your ass pinched? I'm right here" IS THIS YOUR HERO? Also look at how Kjo is laughing. BOLLYWOOD IS FULL OF SCUMS pic.twitter.com/nZbEWiTlp8 — babu bisleri (@PUNchayatiii) January 10, 2019
Fans have now pushed put an old video where Ranveer Singh confesses his regret around his statements. He admitted that he was arrogant when he made his debut. Singh's fans got divided on the social media platform and while half of them are protecting his image, a few others are lashing out on the actor.

A comment reads,
"Wish people would stop delivering snap judgments on social media! Trial by Twitter provoked by malicious trolls should stop."
Watch the video and decide for yourself.
